ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, then disregard my previous comments about ShowEQ ; ). I guess they have changed how innate skills progress if what you describe is the case. Typically
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, then disregard my previous comments about ShowEQ ; ). I guess they have
changed how innate skills progress if what you describe is the case.
Typically skill progression works in the manner I described earlier.
Anyhow, I'm certain you will see swimming skill improvements when your
level catches up to your skill.

Best,

j

At 03:40 PM 4/27/00 -0500, you wrote:
>Bennett, Brian writes:
>
> > Something's bad wrong - am I nuts or does my human monk swimming cap at the
> > 5+5*level limit?
> >
> > With this and all the good faction rumors... *sigh*
>
>Ikkies START with 100 swimming, and mine's stopped at 120 at lvl 4.
>I'm guessing that the cap is thus 100 + (5 * lvl). Don't know if
>that's unique to ikkies (the cap) or if just by some luck of the throw
>of the dice, I haven't gotten any skill raises since I hit 120.
>
>I never thought swimming was lvl capped, but now I'm not so sure.
